statements: SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE reading > 100;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM predictive_maintenance ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, reading FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY reading ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM predictive_maintenance;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp, reading FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(reading) AS avg_reading FROM predictive_maintenance GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT MAX(reading) AS max_reading, MIN(reading) AS min_reading FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT timestamp, reading FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY reading DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT timestamp, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 40 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day' AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT sensor_id, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_details LIKE '%cleaned%' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 OR humidity > 60 ORDER BY humidity DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT type, COUNT(*) FROM Sensors GROUP BY type;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, timestamp FROM Sensors JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Calibration' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT sensor_name, type FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Readings WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, maintenance_type FROM Sensors JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Sensors.sensor_id = MaintenanceLogs.sensor_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine';
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE model = 'XYZ';
SELECT sensor_id, installation_date FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%Temperature%';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time, reading_value FROM SensorData ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE labor_cost > 500;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, installation_date FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM Sensors JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id WHERE reading_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, maintenance_type, labor_cost FROM Sensors JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Sensors.sensor_id = MaintenanceLogs.sensor_id WHERE labor_cost > 100;

SELECT sensor_name, maintenance_required, confidence_level FROM Sensors JOIN PredictiveMaintenanceResults ON Sensors.sensor_id = PredictiveMaintenanceResults.sensor_id WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location='Room 1';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM predictive_model WHERE model_accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location = 'factory';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_status = 'completed';
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM predictive_model WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8;
